features: 【2 in 1 Computer Tablet with Keyboard】This item is a perfect combination, 10 inch Tablet connect with Bluetooth Keyboard you can use it as computer. Also with a mouse, protective case, flexible stylus, screen protector. Very easy to set up and connect. convenience for your work. You can change the tablet mode and computer mode easily.

【Android 11 High Performance Tablet】Tablet adopt the latest Android 11 System. Faster than Android 10. And compatible with more aplications. Powerful Performance Quad Core CPU up to 1.8Ghz Speed, allows you to play games, watching movies, surfing internet, working online more smooth. More stable and fast when runing the tablet. Supports multitask without getting stuck.

【Multifuntional Tablet PC】Tablet has 6GB RAM, 128GB ROM storage and expandable up to 1TB. You can store more e-books, music, pictures, videos, games and Aplicitions. Tablet Passed GMS certification, You can download like Youtube, Netflix etc. Other function: 2+8MP Dual Camera, Dual Speaker, BT 5.0, 2.4Ghz, 5Ghz, Wifi6 etc. Meet most of the life scenarios. Suitable for entertainment and work.

【Fast Wifi Mode】This 10 inch Tablet use the newest wifi model, not only support 2.4ghz and 5ghz wifi, but also the wifi 6 mode. Connecting to the network is faster and more stable. It is smoother when browsing web pages and watching videos.

【10 inch IPS Tablet & Big Capacity Battery】This 10 inch tablet has an 1280x800 Resolution IPS Touch Screen, colorful and clear. allows you to enjoy vivid visual. Eye protection mode ensures reduced eye fatigue when you watch videos or work online. 6000mAh Battery with low power consumption CPU, it can be easily used more than 10 hours, when you travelling.

【Complete Accessories and Best Service】Package include: 1* 10 inch tablet pc, 1* Bluetooth Keyboard, 1* mouse, 1* Standable Protective Case, 1* Screen protector, 1* flexible stylus, 1* Charger, 1*Type C Cable. Our tablet come with 1 year warranty and life time tech support. Any question, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bright screen.
reviews.reviewText: I'm very impressed with this unit. Was hesitant because of the price but have been very pleasantly surprised thus far. It comes with EVERYTHING, power power adapter, screen protector, sturdy cover, keyboard and mouse. The mouse requires 2 AAA batteries not included, but the keyboard has a built-in rechargeable. It all communicates well together. I got a micro SD card, too, but it's not yet arrived.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The tablet is amazing. Good if you don’t want to spend a lot of money on a brand tablet for traveling. You can do almost everything that you can in a computer. You can download kindle which is a big plus for me. Its light and convenient. Its a little bit slower than I expected, but it gets the job done. You can also download kids apps and use it as a kids tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price this is a perfect starter tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The keyboard does not work without it being plugged up
reviews.reviewText: I like the tablet. The mouse works.. however the keyboard does not charge nor without it being plugged up. Does not come with instructions either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far I like it.
reviews.reviewText: You get some accessories. Picture is pretty good. Speakers could be better. I like it. Good tablet for starters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars please read review over all it’s great so far
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I would have gave it 5⭐️ but my charger cord came bunched up and don’t work it has a short In it and my screen shock protector had little bits of dirt on it or something and it would not stick with out leaving bubbles I even tried to pick them off with a credit card corner there where just too many I through it away it dose come with a screen protector on it just not the really good one I will put it in a shock case anyways so the screen protector I don’t care about other then that the case it comes in is really nice and I really like the box to store it in even for travel and just so you know I just got it and set it up have not really used it yet so I don’t know much about it Past the looks and setting it up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tablet for my husband's birthday and he seems pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: It's not a bad purchase really its simple and neat and it's very useful for what I need it for but don't expect a full blown computer it's more like a old android phone with a extra large screen but be prepared to purchase an extra mouse, the one that came with it didn't work at all as in not turning on not pairing nothing but other than that it's not a bad little device.
